name: Poutine
description: A Quebecois classic made in minutes at home!

ingredients.name: cheese curds or grated cheddar cheese

preparation: Toss potatoes in oil and place in a single layer on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
Coarsely grind Salt and Pepper overtop and sprinkle with 1 tbsp Herb & Garlic Dip Mix.
Bake 20 minutes. Turn potato wedges over, sprinkle with remaining Herb & Garlic Dip Mix, and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until potatoes are crisp and golden.
Portion into bowls, then sprinkle with cheddar. Spoon Gravy overtop.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Savoury Herb Gravy Mix
summary: This better-for-you gravy mix is sure to be a hit at Thanksgiving dinner! A vegan, low-sodium blend that’s still packed with flavor.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
